name: pam-diff
description: Measure differences between pixel arrays extracted from pam images

scripts.doc: ./node_modules/.bin/jsdoc index.js -d docs && git commit -m "update docs" -- docs
scripts.examples: node examples/example && node examples/example2 && node examples/example3 && node examples/example4 && node examples/example5
scripts.test: npm run gray && npm run rgb && npm run rgba
scripts.gray: npm run gray:all && npm run gray:mask && npm run gray:region && npm run gray:regions
scripts.gray:all: npm run gray:all:percent && npm run gray:all:bounds && npm run gray:all:blobs
scripts.gray:mask: npm run gray:mask:percent && npm run gray:mask:bounds && npm run gray:mask:blobs
scripts.gray:region: npm run gray:region:percent && npm run gray:region:bounds && npm run gray:region:blobs
scripts.gray:regions: npm run gray:regions:percent && npm run gray:regions:bounds && npm run gray:regions:blobs
scripts.rgb: npm run rgb:all && npm run rgb:mask && npm run rgb:region && npm run rgb:regions
scripts.rgb:all: npm run rgb:all:percent && npm run rgb:all:bounds && npm run rgb:all:blobs
scripts.rgb:mask: npm run rgb:mask:percent && npm run rgb:mask:bounds && npm run rgb:mask:blobs
scripts.rgb:region: npm run rgb:region:percent && npm run rgb:region:bounds && npm run rgb:region:blobs
scripts.rgb:regions: npm run rgb:regions:percent && npm run rgb:regions:bounds && npm run rgb:regions:blobs
scripts.rgba: npm run rgba:all && npm run rgba:mask && npm run rgba:region && npm run rgba:regions
scripts.rgba:all: npm run rgba:all:percent && npm run rgba:all:bounds && npm run rgba:all:blobs
scripts.rgba:mask: npm run rgba:mask:percent && npm run rgba:mask:bounds && npm run rgba:mask:blobs
scripts.rgba:region: npm run rgba:region:percent && npm run rgba:region:bounds && npm run rgba:region:blobs
scripts.rgba:regions: npm run rgba:regions:percent && npm run rgba:regions:bounds && npm run rgba:regions:blobs
scripts.pam: npm run pam:gray && npm run pam:rgb && npm run pam:rgba
scripts.pam:gray: node --expose-gc examples/createPam --pixfmt gray --response bounds --draw false --target regions
scripts.pam:rgb: node --expose-gc examples/createPam --pixfmt rgb24 --response bounds --draw false --target regions
scripts.pam:rgba: node --expose-gc examples/createPam --pixfmt rgba --response bounds --draw false --target regions
scripts.draw: npm run draw:gray&& npm run draw:rgb && npm run draw:rgba
scripts.draw:gray: node --expose-gc examples/createPam --pixfmt gray --response blobs --draw true --target regions
scripts.draw:rgb: node --expose-gc examples/createPam --pixfmt rgb24 --response blobs --draw true --target regions
scripts.draw:rgba: node --expose-gc examples/createPam --pixfmt rgba --response blobs --draw true --target regions

author: Kevin Godell <kevin.godell@gmail.com>
